title: Hands-on AI Cookbook Changelog
description: Latest updates from the Hands-on AI Cookbook — new content, plugins, and platform guides.

items.title: Introducing the Changelog and MCP Server
items.content_html: New Changelog with RSS feed, plus a dedicated MCP server so AI assistants can search the cookbook directly.

items.title: I Built an Open-Source AI Cookbook for Builders. Here's What's Inside.
items.content_html: Why I built the Hands-on AI Cookbook -- a free, open-source resource with a framework, building blocks, and ready-made tools for applied AI.
